MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12  area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Grosvenor Crescent. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm due to repairs required to our equipment near 7B Grosvenor Crescent  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:48pm on Sunday, 07 March 2021
